Package org.cesecore.config

Class OcspConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.config.OcspConfiguration
  • public class OcspConfiguration
extends Object
    Parses configuration bundled in conf/ocsp.properties, both for the internal and external OCSP responder.
    Version:
    $Id: OcspConfiguration.java 28629 2018-04-04 11:32:55Z henriks $

      • OcspConfiguration

        public OcspConfiguration()

    • Method Detail

      • getSignatureAlgorithm

        public static String getSignatureAlgorithm()
        Returns:
        Algorithm used by server to generate signature on OCSP responses

      • isAcceptedSignatureAlgorithm

        public static boolean isAcceptedSignatureAlgorithm​(String sigAlg)
        Returns if the specified signature algorithm is among the signature algorithms accepted by EJBCA. The signatures algorithms that are accepted by EJBCA are specified in 'ocsp.signaturealgorithm' in the EJBCA_HOME/conf/ocsp.properties file.
        Parameters:
        sigAlg - Algorithm name
        Returns:
        'true' if sigAlg is accepted by EJBCA, and 'false' otherwise

      • clearAcceptedSignatureAlgorithmCache

        public static void clearAcceptedSignatureAlgorithmCache()
        acceptedSignatureAlgorithms are cached, so if we try to dynamically change the value (for testing) we need to clear this cache so it is reloaded.

      • getRekeyingUpdateTimeInSeconds

        public static long getRekeyingUpdateTimeInSeconds()
        Returns:
        How often the standalone OCSP certificate cache should be checked for expiring certificates. Default value i 1 hour

      • getRekeyingSafetyMarginInSeconds

        public static long getRekeyingSafetyMarginInSeconds()
        Returns:
        How long from true expiry time that a certificate should be renewed. Default value is 1 day

      • getSigningCertsValidTimeInMilliseconds

        public static int getSigningCertsValidTimeInMilliseconds()
        Returns:
        The interval on which new OCSP signing certificates are loaded in milliseconds

      • getRequestSigningCertRevocationCacheTimeMs

        public static long getRequestSigningCertRevocationCacheTimeMs()
        Returns:
        The interval on which new OCSP signing certificates are loaded in milliseconds

      • getEnforceRequestSigning

        public static boolean getEnforceRequestSigning()
        Returns:
        If set to true the responder will enforce OCSP request signing

      • getRestrictSignatures

        @Deprecated
public static boolean getRestrictSignatures()
        Deprecated.
        Returns:
        If set to true the responder will restrict OCSP request signing

      • getRestrictSignaturesByMethod

        @Deprecated
public static int getRestrictSignaturesByMethod()
        Deprecated.
        Set this to issuer or signer depending on how you want to restrict allowed signatures for OCSP request signing.
        Returns:
        one of OcspConfiguration.RESTRICTONISSUER and OcspConfiguration.RESTRICTONSIGNER

      • getSignTrustDir

        @Deprecated
public static String getSignTrustDir()
        Deprecated.
        Returns:
        If ocsp.restrictsignatures is true the Servlet will look in this directory for allowed signer certificates or issuers.

      • getIncludeCertChain

        public static boolean getIncludeCertChain()
        Returns:
        If set to true the certificate chain will be returned with the OCSP response.

      • getIncludeSignCert

        public static boolean getIncludeSignCert()
        Returns:
        If set to true the signature certificate will be included the OCSP response.

      • getResponderIdType

        @Deprecated
public static int getResponderIdType()
        Deprecated.
        no longer used, as responder ID type is instead set individually for each keybinding and CA
        If set to name the OCSP responses will use the Name ResponseId type, if set to keyhash the KeyHash type will be used.
        Returns:
        one of OCSPUtil.RESPONDERIDTYPE_NAME and OCSPUtil.RESPONDERIDTYPE_KEYHASH

      • getNonExistingIsGood

        public static boolean getNonExistingIsGood()
        Returns:
        true if a certificate that does not exist in the database, but is issued by a CA the responder handles will be treated as not revoked.

      • getNonExistingIsRevoked

        public static boolean getNonExistingIsRevoked()
        Returns:
        true if a certificate that does not exist in the database, but is issued by a CA the responder handles will be treated as revoked.

      • getNonExistingIsUnauthorized

        public static boolean getNonExistingIsUnauthorized()
        Returns:
        true if a certificate that does not exist in the database, but is issued by a CA the responder handles will be responded to with an unsigned "Unauthorized" response.

      • getNonExistingIsGoodOverideRegex

        public static String getNonExistingIsGoodOverideRegex()
        Calls from client fulfilling this regex returns good for non existing certificates even if getNonExistingIsGood() return false.
        Returns:
        the regex

      • getNonExistingIsBadOverideRegex

        public static String getNonExistingIsBadOverideRegex()
        Calls from client fulfilling this regex returns "not existing" for non existing certificates even if getNonExistingIsGood() return true.
        Returns:
        the regex

      • getNonExistingIsRevokedOverideRegex

        public static String getNonExistingIsRevokedOverideRegex()
        Calls from client fulfilling this regex returns "revoked" for non existing certificates even if getNonExistingIsGood() return true.
        Returns:
        the regex

      • getDefaultResponderId

        @Deprecated
public static String getDefaultResponderId()
        Deprecated.
        This value is deprecated since 6.2.4, and only remains in order to allow migration. Default responder is now set in global configuration instead.
        Specifies the subject of a certificate which is used to identify the responder which will generate responses when no real CA can be found from the request. This is used to generate 'unknown' responses when a request is received for a certificate that is not signed by any CA on this server.
        Returns:
        the name configured in ocsp.defaultresponder, reordered to EJBCA normalized ordering.

      • getExtensionOids

        @Deprecated
public static List<String> getExtensionOids()
        Deprecated.
        Specifies OCSP extension OIDs that will result in a call to an extension class, separate multiple entries with ';'. For any entry that should be always used, preface with '*' (e.g. *2.16.578.1.16.3.2) Deprecated: May still be required for 6.12 upgrades
        Returns:
        a List<String> of extension OIDs, an empty list if none are found.

      • getExtensionClasses

        @Deprecated
public static List<String> getExtensionClasses()
        Deprecated.
        since 6.12. May still be required for upgrades.
        Specifies classes implementing OCSP extensions matching OIDs in getExtensionOid(), separate multiple entries with ';'.
        Returns:
        a List<String> of extension classes

      • getAlwaysSendCustomOCSPExtension

        public static String getAlwaysSendCustomOCSPExtension()
        Intended for debugging.
        Returns:
        OID of extension to always respond with, even if not requested.

      • getUnidTrustDir

        @Deprecated
public static String getUnidTrustDir()
        Deprecated.
        since 6.12. May still be required for upgrades. CA+serial of trusted certificates are now stored in the database, in internal key bindings.
        Returns:
        Directory containing certificates of trusted entities allowed to query for Fnrs.

      • getUnidCaCert

        @Deprecated
public static String getUnidCaCert()
        Deprecated.
        since 6.12. May still be required for upgrades. CA+serial of trusted certificates are now stored in the database, in internal key bindings.
        Returns:
        File containing the CA-certificate, in PEM format, that signed the trusted clients.

      • isUnidEnabled

        public static boolean isUnidEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if UnidFnr is enabled in ocsp.properties

      • getAuditLog

        public static boolean getAuditLog()
        Returns:
        When true, an audit log will be created.

      • getLogDateFormat

        public static String getLogDateFormat()
        Returns:
        A format string for logging of dates in auditLog and accountLog.

      • getLogTimeZone

        public static String getLogTimeZone()
        Returns:
        A format string for TimeZone auditLog and accountLog.

      • getLogSafer

        public static boolean getLogSafer()
        Returns:
        Set to true if you want transactions to be aborted when logging fails.

      • getAuditLogPattern

        public static String getAuditLogPattern()
        Returns:
        A String to create a java Pattern to format the audit Log

      • getAuditLogOrder

        public static String getAuditLogOrder()
        Returns:
        A String which combined with auditLogPattern determines how auditLog output is formatted.

      • getHealthCheckSignTest

        public static boolean getHealthCheckSignTest()
        Returns:
        All available signing keys should be tested.

      • getHealthCheckCertificateValidity

        public static boolean getHealthCheckCertificateValidity()
        Returns:
        true if the validity of the OCSP signing certificates should be tested by the healthcheck.

      • getTransactionLog

        public static boolean getTransactionLog()
        Returns:
        When true, a transaction log will be created.

      • getTransactionLogPattern

        public static String getTransactionLogPattern()
        Returns:
        A String to create a java Pattern to format the transaction Log.

      • getTransactionLogOrder

        public static String getTransactionLogOrder()
        Returns:
        A String which combined with transactionLogPattern determines how transaction Log output is formatted.

      • getExpiredArchiveCutoff

        public static long getExpiredArchiveCutoff()
        Returns:
        The default number of milliseconds a response is valid, or -1 to disable. See RFC5019.

      • getUntilNextUpdate

        public static long getUntilNextUpdate​(int certProfileId)
        Parameters:
        certProfileId - profile ID
        Returns:
        The default number of milliseconds a response is valid, or 0 to disable. See RFC5019.

      • isUntilNextUpdateConfigured

        public static boolean isUntilNextUpdateConfigured​(int certificateProfileId)
        Parameters:
        certificateProfileId - Profile ID
        Returns:
        true if Until Next Update is explicitly configured for the requested certificate profile

      • getRevokedUntilNextUpdate

        public static long getRevokedUntilNextUpdate​(int certProfileId)
        Parameters:
        certProfileId - profile ID
        Returns:
        The default number of milliseconds a response of a revoked certificate is valid, or 0 to disable. See RFC5019.

      • isRevokedUntilNextUpdateConfigured

        public static boolean isRevokedUntilNextUpdateConfigured​(int certificateProfileId)
        Parameters:
        certificateProfileId - Profile ID
        Returns:
        true if Until Next Update is explicitly configured for the requested certificate profile in case of a revoked certificate

      • getMaxAge

        public static long getMaxAge​(int certProfileId)
        Parameters:
        certProfileId - profile ID
        Returns:
        The default number of milliseconds a HTTP-response should be cached. See RFC5019.

      • isMaxAgeConfigured

        public static boolean isMaxAgeConfigured​(int certificateProfileId)
        Parameters:
        certificateProfileId - Profile ID
        Returns:
        true if Until Next Update is explicitly configured for the requested certificate profile

      • getRevokedMaxAge

        public static long getRevokedMaxAge​(int certProfileId)
        Parameters:
        certProfileId - Profile ID
        Returns:
        The default number of milliseconds a HTTP-response for a revoked certificater should be cached. See RFC5019.

      • isRevokedMaxAgeConfigured

        public static boolean isRevokedMaxAgeConfigured​(int certificateProfileId)
        Parameters:
        certificateProfileId - Profile ID
        Returns:
        true if Until Next Update is explicitly configured for the requested certificate profile in case of a revoked certificate

      • getSoftKeyDirectoryName

        @Deprecated
public static String getSoftKeyDirectoryName()
        Deprecated.
        Returns:
        Directory name of the soft keystores. The signing keys will be fetched from all files in this directory. Valid formats of the files are JKS and PKCS12 (p12)."

      • getKeyPassword

        @Deprecated
public static String getKeyPassword()
        Deprecated.
        The password for the all the soft keys of the OCSP responder.
        Returns:
        getStorePassword() if property isn't set.

      • getStorePassword

        @Deprecated
public static String getStorePassword()
        Deprecated.
        The password to all soft keystores.
        Returns:
        the value of getKeyPassword() if property isn't set.

      • getCardPassword

        public static String getCardPassword()
        Returns:
        The password for all keys stored on card.

      • getHardTokenClassName

        public static String getHardTokenClassName()
        Returns:
        The class that implements card signing of the OCSP response.

      • getSunP11ConfigurationFile

        @Deprecated
public static String getSunP11ConfigurationFile()
        Deprecated.
        Returns:
        Sun P11 configuration file name.

      • getRekeyingTriggingHosts

        public static Set<String> getRekeyingTriggingHosts()
        Get set of host IPs that are allowed to trigger rekeying.
        Returns:
        the array

      • getRekeyingTriggingPassword

        public static String getRekeyingTriggingPassword()
        Get password needed for triggering rekey. Null means that it is not possible to trigger rekey.
        Returns:
        the password

      • getEjbcawsracliUrl

        public static String getEjbcawsracliUrl()
        Returns:
        EJBCA web service URL

public static String getP11SharedLibrary()

        P11 shared library path name.
        Returns:
        The value;

      • getP11Password

        @Deprecated
public static String getP11Password()
        Deprecated.
        P11 password.
        Returns:
        The value

      • getP11SlotIndex

        @Deprecated
public static String getP11SlotIndex()
        Deprecated.
        P11 slot number.
        Returns:
        The value.

      • getDoNotStorePasswordsInMemory

        @Deprecated
public static boolean getDoNotStorePasswordsInMemory()
        Deprecated.
        Should passwords be stored in memory. Default value is true.
        Returns:
        True if password should not be stored in memory.

      • getWarningBeforeExpirationTime

        public static long getWarningBeforeExpirationTime()
        Returns:
        The interval on which new OCSP signing certificates are loaded in seconds
